original_title: کنسرت محمدرضا شجریان و گروه شهناز در دبی
overview: The Iranian classical music legend Mohammadrea Shajarian in presence of Shahnaz ensemble performing the songs mostly from the very late album of their, this time in Dubai in 2011.
title: Mohammadreza Shajarian & Shahnaz Ensemble Live in Concert: Dubai
